text: Flood Relief / Food Security including nutrition for children and lactating mothers / Shelter and Tents / Health Support / Livestock support including vaccination / Water and sanitation.

box.tital: Clean water for Flood Affected People
box.text: Clean Water is our first priority for Flood Affected People's and for their Children's and Cattles
Food is th basic need For people and we need Security for their cattles and nutrition is very good for their children's

box.tital: Ready made Clothing for People And Children
box.text: We need ready make cloths for flood affected people's and for their children's

box.tital: Health Support for People's and their Livestock
box.text: For the Health Support we need Vaccines And Other Medicines And Doctors For giving them best Health Support

box.tital: Anti Dengue Mosquito Nets And Spray
box.text: Dengue is also so much spreading and infected so much people in Bangladesh We need Nets And Spray For Killing this Mosquito
We need Tents and Shelter For Flood affected people and many other people's which are going from other crisis
